forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Light Rain then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain before 5am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 52, with temperatures rising to around 56 overnight. South southwest wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8am, then rain likely between 8am and 11am, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 50 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 8 to 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.
